document.full_text: stephen fry has been cast as a mayor in the "hobbit" movies being made in new zealand by peter jackson -- a move widely cheered by fans of the english comedian, actor and writer.
document.title: fans cheer stephen fry casting in "hobbit" movie
lines_and_colors: stephen fry has been cast as a mayor in the "hobbit" movies being made in new zealand by peter jackson -- a move widely cheered by fans of the english comedian, actor and writer.
